projects.title: JavaScript Chess AI
description: Determines next move by evaluating possible scenarios a variable number of moves into the future
Uses a minimax tree with alpha-beta pruning and a hash-map based board state representation

projects.title: Personal Website
description: Created a terminal emulator allowing the user to navigate the entire site through text commands (pls try it if you havent)
Produced interactive SVG graphics, CSS animations and a responsive design
Configured site to pull content from single JSON file to facilitate efficient content management
Implemented using React, SASS, Adobe Illustrator and Sketch
